channel.title: Glory-realm offical release
channel.description:
[center][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/J5Q1cj0.gif[/img]
Glory-Realm is a 317 server that is fairly new Features: Active Community-24/7 Vps Hosted- Active and kind staff team-No bugs!-Clans-Active Clan wars-Castel wars-Great donation benefits Many Bosses Team Bossing
MEDIA: [url=http://imgur.com/T96fU0l.png]http://imgur.com/T96fU0l.png[/url] [url=http://prntscr.com/5v0wsq]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url] I know there's not much media. [/center]
[url=http://www.glory-realm.com]Glory-Realm[/url]
